content.description: This is the extension to Cold Turkey (V5)  Starts a tad bit lower and to the right. Moving into and finishing Among the Dead. Your pretty much throwing to the vicious two finger pocket 2nd move.
content.location: to the right of Among The Dead

content.description: Great problem starts low with your left hand out left on the arête. Maneuver into the vicious two finger pocket and crank hard up and out to the arête. Heel hook and move up on progressively better slopers the higher you get. Top and and downclimb the to the right. Going to the top has only been done once.... Carl Gostola made the mistake you find nothing and it will give you nothing. Exit off to the right ya been warned!

Beautiful huge overhanging boulder. One of the first blocks you encounter as you come around the corner of the first couple of blocks. Has 2 established problems with room for 1 or 2 more great problems on the back ( east) side. Get ready to test your finger strength on the small two finger pocket that pulls in tendon pulling directions. If you can manage this drink a beer or two. Pull your virgin tendons and you could be left for dead by the locals.
